comment: The code is given to you, and as long as you take detailed notes I know that you will be able to use what you had learned in a future work position. She responds quickly to messages, and she is always willing to help a student. She is an all around good person. The class isn't difficult, I would attend every class in order to understand the code.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
